Oh geez, that was priceless. Something Awful always makes me laugh… Photoshop Fridays are the best!

The big question here is...

Are any of the typefaces showcased designed by a Typophiler?

Nobody would own up to it.

Nick Cooke

Not because they're crap--which they aren't\*--but because it would spoil the joke.

\*When a smart actor nails a dumb role, they get an Oscar. Think Monster.

I also about busted a gut laughing. My only complaint is that the text of "HIS FACE IS FONTS!" is set in Letter Gothic rather than Inconsolata. I mean, if you're gonna do free fonts, might as well get it right, no?
